nodes.description: 印度于1996年授予巴基斯坦最惠国（MFN）地位。
nodes.support_text: India granted the MFN status to Pakistan way back in 1996, but the neighbouring country had not reciprocated.

nodes.description: 巴基斯坦于2012年承诺授予印度最惠国地位但后来收回。
nodes.support_text: In 2012, Pakistan had committed to giving the MFN status to India but retracted later due to domestic opposition.

nodes.description: 普尔瓦马发生恐怖袭击，造成至少40名CRPF人员死亡。
nodes.support_text: At least 40 CRPF personnel were killed and five injured on Thursday in one of the deadliest terror attacks in Jammu and Kashmir when a Jaish-e-Mohammed suicide bomber rammed a vehicle carrying over 100 kg of explosives into their bus in Pulwama district.

nodes.description: 袭击发生后，印度于周五撤销了对巴基斯坦的最惠国地位。
nodes.support_text: India on Friday revoked the MFN status to Pakistan in the aftermath of the Pulwama terror attack .

nodes.description: 印度于周六将对从巴基斯坦进口的所有商品的关税提高至200%。
nodes.support_text: India Saturday raised the customs duty to 200 per cent on all goods imported from the neighbouring country, including fresh fruits, cement, petroleum products and mineral ore.

nodes.description: 财政部长阿尔温德·贾伊特利在推特上发表了关于撤回最惠国待遇和提高关税的声明。
nodes.support_text: finance minister Arun Jaitley said in a tweet

nodes.description: 该决定将严重打击巴基斯坦对印度的出口。
nodes.support_text: 该决定将严重打击巴基斯坦对印度的出口。

nodes.description: 印度援引WTO的安全例外条款。
nodes.support_text: 印度援引了世界贸易组织的安全例外条款。

edges.support_text: India on Friday revoked the MFN status to Pakistan in the aftermath of the Pulwama terror attack .
Taking strong economic action against Pakistan following the Pulwama terror attack , India Saturday raised the customs duty to 200 per cent on all goods imported from the neighbouring country...
根据temporal_order，普尔瓦马袭击(temporal_order: 1)在印度援引条款(temporal_order: 2)之前。
Upon withdrawal, basic customs duty on all goods exported from Pakistan to India has been raised to 200 per cent with immediate effect," finance minister Arun Jaitley said in a tweet.
根据时序，印度采取行动（temporal_order: 3）在财政部长发表声明（temporal_order: 5）之前。
根据temporal_order，提高关税价格（temporal_order: 3）在打击出口（temporal_order: 4）之前。
根据temporal_order，印度援引条款(temporal_order: 2)在提高关税(temporal_order: 3)之前。
